p:
The trends in both onset and break-up of observed stratification (see below) were assessed in R
51 using either a generalized additive modelling (with a cubic regression spline using cross-validation to optimize k, the number of knots)
58 or a linear model. The optimum model selected based on the Akaike information criterion. The residuals from each model were checked for any breach of assumptions. A correlation structure was added to the model for Windermere South Basin for stratification break-up to account for autocorrelation in model residuals.
